comment: This class was interesting, but incredibly boring. She is the definition of monotone. She is a very nice lady and willing to help you. I honestly went to the class about 6-7 times and got a C because I did very well on the exams. Not a hard class to get an A if you can stay awake

Very nice lady, but I absolutely hated this class. For about a month all we did was presentations over pieces of art. I can't say I've really taken much out of this class. I'd go with another elective if possible. This class will bore you right to sleep.

Used book at first to study for tests and made As. other ppl did not use their books so failed so then she made the tests not over the book which made them harder not easier. her class was not horrible but im sure there are easier teachers. she did not take attendance but sometimes there were in class assignments

She is very monotone and obviously loves what she teaches. For my class, the October-December we had class presentations over famous pieces of works. Tests are easy and you have to go to three events.

This professor is monotone and lectures are very long but, sometimes they are interesting. Her tests are decently hard but not impossible. you must read a lot of the text and have incredible notes to even have a chance to get an A on the tests. She is overall a nice lady, but i wouldn't take her again.

She's a very nice lady and her lectures are interesting. She wants you to do well.  Although attendence is not mandatory, you won't do well unless you attend the lectures. Tests are based on lectures, books and presentations.  Taking good notes is a must.

You would think that an art class would be easy, but it's hard when you can't stay awake during lectures. Not too bad of a class, just monotonous lectures. She's an approachable person who wants her students to do well. Study the book. Pay attention to what she says about paintings. Tests were decently hard. Not really sure how to prepare properly.

One of the most boring classes I've ever taken. She reads the whole entire class and make stupid jokes that no one, but herself laughs. Class is easy to get good grades though, but I'd still suggest you take a different professor.
TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE. Gives useless study guides and assignments. When she teaches, she reads straight off of wikipedia...worst teacher ever

WORST TEACHER EVER. AVOID AT ALL COST. She tells you to read an absurd  amount of pages in the book and the questions on the test aren't even based on it. She sounds like a robot and is not helpful at all. AVOID AT ALL COST
